rules_text:
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
[i]Invocation[/i] – When you spend four or more mana to cast a spell or activate an ability during your turn, transform Corrupted Sorcerer.
flavor_text:
[i]She sought protection from forces beyond
her understanding . . .[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever Conjured Stalker attacks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text2: [i]. . . and now every breath she takes, every move, every step—[/i]it [i]is watching.[/i]
